long_description: Turn your Jetboil Personal Cooking System into a French press and sip your favorite coffee in the backcountry with this accessory. Minimal weight is a small price to pay to enjoy your favorite bean rather than instant coffee. Works just like a French press in your Jetboil cup. Includes basket, rod and knob. Stows inside Jetboil cup, so it won't take up any space in your pack.
short_description: Turn your Jetboil Personal Cooking System into a French press and sip your favorite coffee in the backcountry with this accessory.
